segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the woman at the sink completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate like her life depends on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water gushing over the edge of the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and she's just standing in it unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; the cabinets are going to be ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, behind her, kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced precariously on that shaky stool, reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, probably to hide his theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, hand outstretched for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why aren't these parents watching their kids better?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is neat, but inside it's chaos she doesn't see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell at her to turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR
